notes:
The game allows to choose or create a save game but it won't start after that. The screen becomes grey for a second, then it closes completely. I tried to disable esync,  to disable d3d11 or to use wine d3d11 but the game still crashes. 

My steam controller is picked up and works in the menu, but the button layout seems weird.
title: BERSERK and the Band of the Hawk
